title: Google Pay Handler Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the com.google.pay payment handler.

api_version.description: The major Google Pay API version. Currently, this must be 2.

api_version_minor.description: The minor Google Pay API version (e.g., 0).

merchant_info.description: Identity details for the merchant as required by the Google Pay UCP handler.

allowed_payment_methods.description: The payment methods allowed for this transaction.
